trans-unit.source: Represents the table drawn by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 代表資料表所繪製的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>控制項在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control displays data in the form of a grid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控制項會顯示資料方格的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridTableStyle is a class that represents the drawn grid only.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTableStyle 是表示繪製的格線的類別。

trans-unit.source: This grid should not be confused with the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> class, which is a possible source of data for the grid.
trans-unit.target: 此方格不應與混淆<xref:System.Data.DataTable>類別，這是可能的來源資料的方格。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the DataGridTableStyle strictly represents the grid as it is painted in the control.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，DataGridTableStyle 嚴格代表方格控制項中繪製它。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, through the DataGridTableStyle you can control the appearance of the grid for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，透過 DataGridTableStyle 您可以控制<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>格線的外觀

trans-unit.source: To specify which DataGridTableStyle is used when displaying data from a particular <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定哪些 DataGridTableStyle 時，使用中顯示資料從特定資料庫<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，請將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>以<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A><xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>的</xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable>嗎

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property contains all the DataGridTableStyle objects used by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>透過擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>屬性包含所使用的所有 DataGridTableStyle 物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The collection can contain as many DataGridTableStyle objects as you need, however the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of each must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 集合可以包含許多 DataGridTableStyle 物件，視需要不過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>每個必須是唯一的。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: At run time, this allows you to substitute a different DataGridTableStyle for the same data, depending on the user's preference.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，這可讓您取代成不同的 DataGridTableStyle 為相同的資料，根據使用者的喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: To do this: 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> with DataGridTableStyle objects.
trans-unit.target: 填入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>DataGridTableStyle 物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: If a DataGridTableStyle exists in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property value equals the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> property, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is displayed with this DataGridTableStyle.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DataGridTableStyle 存在於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>屬性值等於<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件的<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Data.DataTable>就會顯示此 DataGridTableStyle。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no DataGridTableStyle exists with a matching <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is displayed with the default style for data grid tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有 DataGridTableStyle 已存在的比對<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>、<xref:System.Data.DataTable>就會顯示資料格線資料表的預設樣式。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a different grid style is needed, use the `Item` property to select the appropriate DataGridTableStyle (pass the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property) and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the returned object to a new value.
trans-unit.target: 當需要不同的格線樣式時，使用`Item`屬性，以選取適當的 DataGridTableStyle (傳遞<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>屬性)，並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>為新值傳回的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property to select the desired DataGridTableStyle, and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>選取所需的 DataGridTableStyle，並將其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>以<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A><xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>的</xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding DataGridTableStyle objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 一定要建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件，並將它們<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> DataGridTableStyle 物件之前</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty DataGridTableStyle with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增的有效空 DataGridTableStyle<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值加入集合中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>自動為您產生的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，發生例外狀況會擲回您嘗試加入新的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>物件具有重複的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To determine which DataGridTableStyle is currently displayed, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> to return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷其 DataGridTableStyle 目前顯示，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>來傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> interface, you can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> method to return the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the current table.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>介面，您可以使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A>方法以傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>目前資料表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>

trans-unit.source: This is shown in the C# code below: ``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ``` If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects related through <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects, and the currently displayed <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is a child table, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> will return a string in the form of TableName.RelationName (in the simplest case).
trans-unit.target: 下列 C# 程式碼所示︰``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ```如果<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含<xref:System.Data.DataTable>透過物件相關聯<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>物件，以及目前顯示<xref:System.Data.DataTable>是子資料表中， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>TableName.RelationName （在簡單的情況下） 的形式將傳回的字串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is further down in the hierarchy, the string will consist of the parent table's name followed by the necessary <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> values required to reach the table's level.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.DataTable>會進一步在階層中，字串將會包含父資料表的名稱，後面接著必要<xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>到達資料表的層級所需值。</xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: For example, imagine three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects in a hierarchical relationship named (top to bottom) `Regions`, `Customers`, and `Orders`, and two <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects named `RegionsToCustomers` and `CustomersToOrders`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property will return "Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders".
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設有三個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>階層式關聯性中名為 （從上到下） 的物件`Regions`， `Customers`，和`Orders`，和兩個<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>物件命名`RegionsToCustomers`和`CustomersToOrders`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>屬性會傳回"Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders"。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> will then be "Orders".
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>就會 「 訂單 」。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection of DataGridTableStyle objects is returned through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>傳回的 DataGridTableStyle 物件集合

trans-unit.source: When a DataGridTableStyle is displayed, the settings for the DataGridTableStyle will override the settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTableStyle 的設定顯示 DataGridTableStyle 時，將會覆寫的設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not set for a particular DataGridTableStyle property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's value will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果值未設定特定的 DataGridTableStyle 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控制項的值將會改用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> properties that can be set to override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>可以設定覆寫屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>控制屬性:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A>- </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To create a DataGridTableStyle that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立顯示陣列 DataGridTableStyle，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`typename`其中`typename`會以物件類型的名稱取代。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>屬性會區分大小寫，則型別名稱必須完全相符。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>屬性的範例。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>為<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>繫結

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: 一項功能<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是，它可以包含物件的多個類型，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>只能繫結這類清單在清單中的所有項目時的第一個項目相同的型別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 這表示所有物件都必須屬於相同的類型，或它們必須繼承自相同清單中的第一個項目類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在清單中的第一個項目是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，第二個項目可能是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 如果相反地，第一個項目不是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，第二個物件無法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound and the objects in the DataGridTableStyle must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>與其所繫結和中的 DataGridTableStyle 物件必須包含公用的屬性時，必須有項目在。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: 空白<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>會導致空的方格。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the DataGridTableStyle to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的"ArrayList 」 （類型名稱） 來 DataGridTableStyle。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When the AllowSorting property is set to `true`, a triangle appears in each column header indicating the direction of the sort.
trans-unit.target: 當 AllowSorting 屬性設定為`true`，指出排序的方向各個資料行標頭會出現三角形。

trans-unit.source: The user can click on any column header to sort the grid by that column.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以按一下任何資料行標頭，即可依據該資料行排序方格。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the column a second time changes the direction of the sort.
trans-unit.target: 按一下資料行的第二次變更排序的方向。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name used to map this table to a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來將這個資料表對應至特定資料來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>物件類型必須為物件的強型別陣列包含公用屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the MappingName property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>顯示陣列、 MappingName 屬性設定為`typename`其中`typename`會以物件類型的名稱取代。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the MappingName property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意 MappingName 屬性會區分大小寫。必須完全相符的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: See the MappingName property for an example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 MappingName 屬性的範例。

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>為<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>繫結

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: 一項功能<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是，它可以包含物件的多個類型，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>只能繫結這類清單在清單中的所有項目時的第一個項目相同的型別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 這表示所有物件都必須屬於相同的類型，或它們必須繼承自相同清單中的第一個項目類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在清單中的第一個項目是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，第二個項目可能是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 如果相反地，第一個項目不是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，第二個物件無法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>它繫結時，必須有項目在。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: 空白<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>會導致空的方格。</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the MappingName of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，設定的 MappingName<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>至"ArrayList 」 （類型名稱）。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: The default is the name of the list managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for this grid.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是由管理清單的名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>此格線。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is set using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>使用設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged> event occurs when the MappingName value changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged>MappingName 值變更時，就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name used to map this grid to a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: 用來將這個方格對應至特定資料來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width used to create columns when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示新方格時，建立資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The width used to create columns when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示新方格時，建立資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*>屬性值變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height used to create a row when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示新方格時，建立一個資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: The preferred height is the minimum height needed to accommodate the displayed text with the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 慣用的高度是以符合顯示的文字與指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>所需的最小高度

trans-unit.source: A row will not be created with a height less than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 具有高度小於指定值，將不會建立一個資料列。

trans-unit.source: If the font size requires it, however, the row height may be greater than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 如果字型大小需要它，不過，資料列高度，可能會大於指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The height of a row, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 資料列，單位為像素的高度。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight*> value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight*>值變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以編輯資料行。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify whether individual columns within the table are editable by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an appropriate value, `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定在資料表中的個別資料行是否可編輯，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設為適當的值，`true`或`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, to ensure that the data is not edited, you can set the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class's <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 或者，若要確保未編輯的資料，您可以設定<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>類別的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if columns cannot be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果無法編輯資料行;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly*>值變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers are visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料列標頭是否可見。

trans-unit.source: When row headers are visible, a plus sign is displayed in each row header if the underlying <xref:System.Data.DataTable> has a related child table.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列標頭可見時，將加號會顯示在每個資料列行首基礎<xref:System.Data.DataTable>有關聯的子資料表。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This property will not function until you add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性將無法運作，直到您將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>物件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Until then, setting this property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 之前，設定這個屬性會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if row headers are visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料列標頭可見的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible*> value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible*>值變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of row headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列標頭的寬度。

trans-unit.source: When row headers are visible a plus sign is displayed in each row header if the underlying data has a related child table.
trans-unit.target: 當資料列標頭會顯示加號會顯示每個資料列行首，如果基礎資料具有關聯的子資料表。

trans-unit.source: This property will not function until you add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性將無法運作，直到您將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>物件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Until then, setting this property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 之前，設定這個屬性會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The width of row headers, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 資料列標頭，單位為像素寬度。
